name: nfcsb1
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1)))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1))
-| wi(wtru, wnfc(s0, c0))

|- wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for substitution into a class. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
